title: Scumless Oblige: Reborn as the Scummy Villain in an 18+ Adult Game
description: Before I knew it, I was in a world of 18+ games with magic and erotica. In it, I was reborn as Ultos, the worst scum in history. If I continue like this, I will meet the worst possible fate. Somehow, I must be reborn from the hated character known as 'ScumUltos' into a pure and innocent mob character...!!
author: Avatar
